column3: 2015 annie elizabeth smith was born january 19
column5: illinois to the late lillie mae rhodes and willie brandon. annie attended tennessee state university. annie moved to chicago
column6: illinois to live with her aunt
column8: there at annie aunt's house she met kirby smith
column9: who just moved to chicago after serving in the united states army. she leaves to cherish her memory: her husband
column12: patricia smith morris and pamela smith; granddaughters
column13: lori stewart tannis (karston) and stephanie morris; and a host of nieces and nephews. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
